Name: BlokPad
Description: Bloktopia will act as a tokenised decentralised VR Crypto Skyscraper powered by the Polygon Network. Bloktopia is designed to provide a VR Experience for the crypto community, bringing users together all in one immersive and engaging environment.The Bloktopia Metaverse will be comprised of Real Estate Bloks that can be Purchased & Governed by the Blok token holders.The native token of Bloktopia is $BLOK and holders will be known as Bloktopians.Telegram | Medium
